desc.cn: 提供 deb 包转换为玲珑包的能力，生成构建玲珑应用需要的 linglong.yaml 文件，并依赖 ll-builder 来实现应用构建和导出。
desc.en: Provide the ability to convert the DEB package to the exquisite package, generate the linglong.yaml file required to build the exquisite application, and rely on LL-Builder to achieve application construction and export.
